event: outside at old balcony, sunny and warm (late day), rough stone wall of the building; some interesting insects walk by
some meters away from the building wall, I see a really cute baby version of this [irl: kind of mammal but extremely tiny; idl: insect]. I present my finger and it flies on it
I try to make a photo but know it will be difficult to hold the phone and press the camera trigger with the same hand
thought: I will probably mess this up

event: the animal is scared and flies away from my finger, but not far away. Eventually it disappears in a small stone crack within the building
thought: this was to be expected, it is okay
